author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Hilary Duff cuddles up to new beau Matthew Koma | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Rock hard body: Hilary showed no signs of fat anywhere on her muscular body Romantic holiday: Hilary Duff and her musician boyfriend Matthew Koma celebrated Valentine's Day with a romantic trip to Costa Rica (seen here in Instagram snap posted by the musician) Meanwhile, Duff's ex-husband Mike Comrie is under investigation by the LAPD for allegedly raping a woman Saturday at his West LA condo. According to TMZ , the 36-year-old Canadian insisted that the encounter was consensual and he's known the woman for years. When Radar Online contacted Hilary's mother Susan, she said Mike was a 'great guy' but would not comment otherwise. Jungle love: The Hannah Montana star posted a photo of her giving her beau a kiss in front of a huge tree in the jungle Jungle hike: Hilary and her beau went on a hike through the jungle during their vacation Going strong: The two are seen here cuddling up- on January 28 Not bad! According to Us Weekly, the new couple (both 29) stayed at the lavish Four Seasons Costa Rica located at Peninsula Papagayo 'Date night!' Hilary and Matthew's getaway came after making their red carpet debut at an EW bash on January 28 following a weekend away at Santa Barbara's San Ysidro Ranch This after the Flock of Dudes actress told Cosmopolitan that she was 'good friends' with the retired NHL star and 'wouldn't choose anyone else to coparent with.' Duff and Comrie - whose divorce was finalized a year ago - will celebrate their son Luca's fifth birthday next month. On the career front, the Texan-born blonde will resume her role as Kelsey Peters in the fourth season of Younger, which premieres later this year on TV Land. Consensual? Meanwhile, Duff's ex-husband Mike Comrie is under investigation by the LAPD for allegedly raping a woman Saturday at his West LA condo (pictured December 16) 'I wouldn't choose anyone else to coparent with': Duff and Comrie - whose divorce was finalized a year ago - will celebrate their son Luca's fifth birthday next month Relaxing: The two spent a relaxing week in Costa Rica together as they lounged on beach chairs Inseparable: They seemed to do everything together and even got up and went to the water at the same time Nothing by time! Relaxing days on the beach was a must for this new couple Read more:
